blocks.name: dfdif3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of class difference. (Contributed by BJ and Jim Kingdon, 16-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfdif3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdif(c0, c1), crab(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtri(cdif(c0, c1), crab(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), crab(s0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  dfdif2(s0, c0, c1)
  rabbii(s0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wral(s1, c1, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  bitr4i(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wral(s1, c1, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3bitri(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  bitr4i(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wa(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  biantrur(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  ax6ev(s1, s0)
  19.41v(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  sb56(s1, s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  albii(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  bitri(wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  imbi1i(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  equcom(s1, s0)
  3bitri(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  pm5.74i(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c1)
  con2b(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  bicomi(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-ne(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  df-ral(s1, c1, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wn.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfdif3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 \ c1)= { s0 ‚àà c0 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚â† s1)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtri((c0 \ c1), { s0 ‚àà c0 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚â† s1)}, { s0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1 })
  dfdif2(s0, c0, c1)
  rabbii(s0, c0, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚â† s1))
  bitr4i(¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚â† s1), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1)))
  3bitri(¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1)), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = s0 ‚àß ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 = s0 ‚Üí ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1)))
  bitr4i(¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = s0 ‚àß ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1)), (‚àÉ(s1, s1 = s0)‚àß ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1))
  biantrur(¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = s0))
  ax6ev(s1, s0)
  19.41v(s1, s1 = s0, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1)
  sb56(s1, s0, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1)
  albii(s1, (s1 = s0 ‚Üí ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1))
  bitri((s1 = s0 ‚Üí ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1), (s0 = s1 ‚Üí ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1))
  imbi1i(s1 = s0, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, s0 = s1)
  equcom(s1, s0)
  3bitri((s0 = s1 ‚Üí ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1), (s0 = s1 ‚Üí ¬¨ s1 ‚àà c1), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí ¬¨ s0 = s1))
  pm5.74i(s0 = s1, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ s1 ‚àà c1)
  notbid(s0 = s1, s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1)
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c1)
  con2b(s0 = s1, s1 ‚àà c1)
  imbi2i(s1 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ s0 = s1, s0 ‚â† s1)
  bicomi(¬¨ s0 = s1, s0 ‚â† s1)
  df-ne(s0, s1)
  df-ral(s1, c1, s0 ‚â† s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, s0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: difeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for class difference. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1997.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: difeq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for class difference. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1997.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm difeq2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c2, c0), cdif(c2, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cdif(c2, c0), cdif(c2, c1), crab(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), crab(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  rabbidv(hs0, c2, wceq(c0, c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  notbid(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  dfdif2(hs0, c2, c0)
  dfdif2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm difeq2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c2 \ c0)=(c2 \ c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g((c2 \ c0), (c2 \ c1), { hs0 ‚àà c2 | ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0 }, { hs0 ‚àà c2 | ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1 }, c0 = c1)
  rabbidv(hs0, c2, c0 = c1, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1)
  notbid(c0 = c1, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  eleq2(c0, c1, hs0)
  dfdif2(hs0, c2, c0)
  dfdif2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: difeqri
blocks.content: Inference from membership to difference. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: nfdif
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for class difference. (Contributed by NM, 3-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfdif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cdif(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cdif(c0, c1), crab(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfdif2(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfrab(s0, hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfn(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfdif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ F/(s0,(c0 \ c1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, (c0 \ c1), { hs0 ‚àà c0 | ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1 })
  dfdif2(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfrab(s0, hs0, c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfn(s0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: eldifi
blocks.content: Implication of membership in a class difference. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-1994.)

blocks.name: eldifn
blocks.content: Implication of membership in a class difference. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-1994.)

blocks.name: elndif
blocks.content: A set does not belong to a class excluding it. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-1994.)

blocks.name: neldif
blocks.content: Implication of membership in a class difference. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-1994.)

blocks.name: difdif
blocks.content: Double class difference. Exercise 11 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.)

blocks.name: difss
blocks.content: Subclass relationship for class difference. Exercise 14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-1994.)

blocks.name: difssd
blocks.content: A difference of two classes is contained in the minuend. Deduction form of ~ difss . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: difss2
blocks.content: If a class is contained in a difference, it is contained in the minuend. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: difss2d
blocks.content: If a class is contained in a difference, it is contained in the minuend. Deduction form of ~ difss2 . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: ssdifss
blocks.content: Preservation of a subclass relationship by class difference. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: ddif
blocks.content: Double complement under universal class. Exercise 4.10(s) of [Mendelson] p. 231. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm ddif(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cdif(universe, cdif(universe, c0)), c0)
} = {
  difeqri(hs0, universe, cdif(universe, c0), c0)
  bitr2i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0))))
  con2bii(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  biantrur(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ddif(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (ùïå \(ùïå \ c0))= c0
} = {
  difeqri(hs0, universe, (ùïå \ c0), c0)
  bitr2i((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà(ùïå \ c0)), hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà(ùïå \ c0))
  con2bii(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(ùïå \ c0))
  mpbiran(hs0 ‚àà(ùïå \ c0), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  eldif(hs0, universe, c0)
  biantrur(¬¨ hs0 ‚àà(ùïå \ c0), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((ùïå \ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: ssconb
blocks.content: Contraposition law for subsets. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssconb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c2, cdif(c1, c0))))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c2, cdif(c1, c0)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0)))))
  albidv(hs0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))), wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  syl2an(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wb(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  ssel(c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  pm5.1(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  con2b(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  jcab(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  jcab(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, cdif(c1, c2))
  dfss2(hs0, c2, cdif(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssconb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2)‚Üî c2 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c0)))
} = {
  3bitr4g((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), c0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2), c2 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c0), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c2))), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0))))
  albidv(hs0, (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0)))
  3bitr4g((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  3bitr4g((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2)), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  anbi12d((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0))
  syl2an(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1, ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, hs0)
  ssel(c2, c1, hs0)
  pm5.1((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))
  a1i((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2)‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  con2b(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  jcab(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2)
  jcab(hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)
  imbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2))
  eldif(hs0, c1, c2)
  imbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0))
  eldif(hs0, c1, c0)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, (c1 \ c2))
  dfss2(hs0, c2, (c1 \ c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 \ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 \ c0))
}

blocks.name: sscon
blocks.content: Contraposition law for subsets. Exercise 15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm sscon(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c2, c1), cdif(c2, c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cdif(c2, c1), cdif(c2, c0), wss(c0, c1))
  3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  anim2d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  con3d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  eldif(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c2, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c2, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sscon(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí(c2 \ c1)‚äÜ(c2 \ c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c2 \ c1), (c2 \ c0), c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  3imtr4g(c0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ c1), hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ c0), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0))
  anim2d(c0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)
  con3d(c0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  ssel(c0, c1, hs0)
  eldif(hs0, c2, c1)
  eldif(hs0, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c2 \ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c2 \ c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚äÜ c1)
}

blocks.name: ssdif
blocks.content: Difference law for subsets. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1998.)

blocks.name: ssdifd
blocks.content: If ` A ` is contained in ` B ` , then ` ( A \ C ) ` is contained in ` ( B \ C ) ` . Deduction form of ~ ssdif . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: sscond
blocks.content: If ` A ` is contained in ` B ` , then ` ( C \ B ) ` is contained in ` ( C \ A ) ` . Deduction form of ~ sscon . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: ssdifssd
blocks.content: If ` A ` is contained in ` B ` , then ` ( A \ C ) ` is also contained in ` B ` . Deduction form of ~ ssdifss . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: ssdif2d
blocks.content: If ` A ` is contained in ` B ` and ` C ` is contained in ` D ` , then ` ( A \ D ) ` is contained in ` ( B \ C ) ` . Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: raldifb
blocks.content: Restricted universal quantification on a class difference in terms of an implication. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: complss
blocks.content: Complementation reverses inclusion. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2011.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: compleq
blocks.content: Two classes are equal if and only if their complements are equal. (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)
